title: Acer Swift 3 (2022) vs MacBook Air: Whatâ€™s the best laptop for you?
content:
In the past few months, a wide range of new laptops have been introduced with the latest processors from Intel and AMD. Both companies introduced their latest laptop CPUs in early 2022, so many popular laptop families are getting upgraded with them. That includes the Acer Swift 3, which has recently been refreshed for 2022

The post Acer Swift 3 (2022) vs MacBook Air: What’s the best laptop for you? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Acer Swift 3 is a promisning laptop, but should you buy it instead of the MacBook Air? We compare the two to find out.
